sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"; import {useEffect} from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router"; import "./singlePost.css"; export default function SinglePost() { const location =useLocation(); const path=(location.pathname.split("/")[2]); useEffect(()=>{ const getPost =async ()=>{ const res=axios.get("/posts/"+path); console.log(res); }; getPost(); },[path]) return (

Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet!
